article_title: Can Patrick Soon-Shiong, The World's Richest Doctor, Fix Health Care?

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: Dr. Patrick Soon-Shiong is using a multibilliondollar war chest and massive amounts of data to fix health care and cure disease. His biggest enemy might be his own hype.
og.title: Can Patrick Soon-Shiong, The World's Richest Doctor, Fix Health Care?
